thread.title: lovely stay in Paris
thread.title_full: lovely stay in Paris - Review of Hotel Adele & Jules, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: H1861ZNmichelep
title: lovely stay in Paris
text:
Loved the hotel - was quite, in a grea location and the price was perfect. Thank you for the weekend special. I have stayed in one of the sister hotels previously which is also lovely. The honesty bar is terrific and the staff was lovely. Close to so many of my favorite places and I was able to explore some new areas as well.
Thank you!
